nr.co.sngforge.java2r
Class RHelp

java.lang.Object
  nr.co.sngforge.java2r.RHelp

public class RHelp
extends java.lang.Object

This class can be used for displaying the help from R.

Constructor Summary
RHelp(RFactory rf)
          This creates an instance of this class.
System.out is used as the standard output stream (stdout) nad System.err is used as the error stream(stderr).

          Constructor to instantiate an object of this class.

          This shows Apropos.
 void demo()
          This tells R to show some demos.
protected  void finalize()
          This method ensures that R has exited successfully before the RHelp object is destroyed.
 void getHelp(java.lang.String topic)
          This tells R to show help on a topic.
 void helpSearch(java.lang.String query)
          This tells R to search its help for a query.

Constructor Detail

RHelp

public RHelp(RFactory rf)
      throws java.io.IOException
This creates an instance of this class.
System.out is used as the standard output stream (stdout) nad System.err is used as the error stream(stderr).

Parameters:
rf - An instance of RFactory that has already been initialized.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Thrown if there is an error in redirecting the IO Streams.

RHelp

public RHelp(RFactory rf,
             java.io.OutputStream out,
             java.io.OutputStream err,
             int q)
      throws java.io.IOException
Constructor to instantiate an object of this class.

Parameters:
rf - The RFactory object that has already been initialized.
out - The OutputStream to print the normal standard output(stdout) messages of R. Can be System.out or System.err also.
err - The OutputStream to print the error output(stderr) messages of R. Can be System.out or System.err also.
q - The quietness level in which R will be run.
The follwing values may be used
  • RBase.LESS_QUIET
  • RBase.NOT_QUIET
  • RBase.VERY_QUIET
Throws:
java.io.IOException - Thrown if there is an error in redirecting the IO Streams.
Method Detail

getHelp

public void getHelp(java.lang.String topic)
This tells R to show help on a topic. This is similiar to the command help(topic).

Parameters:
topic - The topic on which help is to shown.

demo

public void demo()
This tells R to show some demos. This is similiar to the command demo().

helpStart

public void helpStart()
This starts the help in an HTML browser interface. This is similiar to the command help.start().

helpSearch

public void helpSearch(java.lang.String query)
This tells R to search its help for a query. This is similiar to the command help.search(query).

Parameters:
query - The search string

apropos

public void apropos(java.lang.String query)
This shows Apropos. This is similiar to the command apropos(query).

Parameters:
query - The string to be used as the parameter.

finalize

protected void finalize()
This method ensures that R has exited successfully before the RHelp object is destroyed.

Overrides:
finalize in class java.lang.Object
